LanguageData.EMPExplodeDesc: An EMP explosion has overloaded and damaged your power generators.
LanguageData.MessageCommandoAssaulting: Ratkin commandos are assaulting the colony.
LanguageData.BlockChanceDefualtDesc:
Deflection
The chance to block damage from outside.

Deflecting can only block attacks within 140 degrees of the front.
This chance is based on the equipment's armor rating and the wearer's melee skill.
